H0.text: In which US TV series was Peter Graves greeted with the message 'Good morning, Mr Phelps '. It Takes a Thief

H1.text: In which US TV series was Peter Graves greeted with the message 'Good morning, Mr Phelps '. The Man from U.N.C.L.E.

H2.text: In which US TV series was Peter Graves greeted with the message 'Good morning, Mr Phelps '. I Spy

H3.text: In which US TV series was Peter Graves greeted with the message 'Good morning, Mr Phelps '. Mission impossible

A4.text: Peter Graves portrayed Jim Phelps in the television series Mission: Impossible from 1967 to 1973.

A5.text: Graves was the only cast member from the original series to return as a regular, reprising his role as Jim Phelps.
